thread.title: European regulators express concerns over bond liquidity
thread.title_full: European regulators express concerns over bond liquidity

author: Financial News
title: European regulators express concerns over bond liquidity
text:
European regulators express concerns over bond liquidity By James Rundle 10 September 2015 Europe's three primary regulators have conceded that regulatory changes may have been a contributing factor to the ongoing lack of liquidity in the region's bond markets.
